code: import i18n from'i18next';import{initReactI18next}from'react-i18next';import HttpApi from'i18next-http-backend';import LanguageDetector from'i18next-browser-languagedetector';i18n.use(initReactI18next).use(LanguageDetector).use(HttpApi).init({supportedLngs:["ru","en"],fallbacklng:"ru",detection:{order:['cookie','htmlTag','localStorage','path','subdomain'],caches:['cookie']},backend:{loadPath:"/assets/locales/{{lng}}/translation.json"}});export default i18n;
